attributes.action: Deliver justice to the mother of Keith Bennett by ordering the police to continue their search for Keith's body or supply funds to allow professional searchers to find his body.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
POLICE have given up the search for Moors Murder victim Keith Bennett - 45 years after he disappeared.  Detectives say a massive hunt for the 12-year-old's remains on Saddleworth Moor, launched under a cloak of secrecy last year, has been unsuccessful.

Keith's mother now needs help to finance a search for her son's body.

We urge the government to allocate funds to allow the search to continue.
